enhanced_description: in.harmony is a specialized HR consultancy providing customized diversity and inclusion solutions. Their services encompass conducting organizational diagnostics and surveys to assess the current state of diversity and culture, designing and implementing targeted interventions, and offering comprehensive support related to the Prevention of Sexual Harassment (POSH). Key offerings include Gender Sensitization training, bespoke Women Empowerment Series (e.g., ADISHAKTI), and broader employee well-being initiatives such as transition support and parenting counseling. The primary goal is to improve employee happiness and engagement by fostering a fair, harassment-free, and inclusive work environment.
